722523f-a.folder: Pearl Street & Madison Street, Manhattan, NY
722523f-a.text:
Pearl Street, east side, north from but not including Madison, to and including Park Row. The Second and Third Aves., Elevated is shown on Park Row, with a Second Ave., Train on the upper level. William Street, is also shown terminating on the west side of Pearl Street, between Park Row and New Chambers Street.
June 24, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.

The same, showing a closer view of Pearl Street, at, adjoining and west of the N.W. corner of Park Row. Pearl Stree8, at Park Row changes its direction to run eest and west when west of Park Row.
September 9, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.

The same, as No. 2, showing a closer view of No. 466 Pearl Street, adjoining the N.W. corner of Park Row, which is a frame
house.
About 1914.
